channel.title: CVE Feed for VeronaLabs -- WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VeronaLabs -- WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc

item.title: CVE-2024-24881|2024-02-08T11:19:21.541Z -- VeronaLabs -- WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc: from n/a through 6.5.2.
